item.title: Jan 20 - Gay Marriage, Rights Issues, Prop 8
item.blip:puredescription: Jamey, Lily and Natalie tackle the controversial topic of Proposition 8 and the battle for equal rights in America. Find out their opinions on celebrity influence on voting and the attack threats on gay bars in Seattle. Other points include individual freedom, censorship, and whether or not educational ads are actually educating, or fooling the general public.

item.title: Jan 20 - New Years Resolutions, Kitty Care, Million Dollar Ideas
item.blip:puredescription: The girls introduce a New Year with a new show. In this episode of Table Topics, the ladies discuss how they rang in the new year, and what they plan to do about making resolutions. Not to mention their opinions on the ongoing battle with saving money and losing weight. Natalie shares information about a website (www.shedoesthecity.com) that encourages you to make resolutions to engage MORE in your guilty pleasures, and Jamey mentions another website (One Million Acts of Green: www.green.cbc.ca) that just might help you go green and take more steps to saving the planet.
